alert.note: Alert for Owsley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 18 at 6:37PM EST until February 18 at 11:00PM EST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Advisory for the following river in Kentucky... South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville affecting Owsley County. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT THROUGH LATE THIS EVENING... ...REPLACES RIVER FLOOD WARNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...South Fork Kentucky River at Booneville. * WHEN...Now through late this evening. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 PM EST Saturday the stage was 24.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall to 5.6 feet early Thursday afternoon. - Action stage is 21.5 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: If you encounter a flooded roadway, turn around and find an alternative route. The next statement will be issued by 11 PM est Saturday.
